courseid,

update course

isappoint = #{isappoint,jdbcType=BIT},
coursecount = #{coursecount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
coursedesc = #{coursedesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where courseid = #{courseid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
